name: PixelMagic
changelog:
• Rebase on new source
  • Most features from previous build added
  • UDFPS is fixed automatically with new source, but also added "screen off udfps"
  • Added "Ambient gestures"
  • Implemented "Dual tone" QS theme
  • New settings style by google
notes:
• Magicxavi also maintains RisingOS, crDroid 10, PixelMagic 14 and YAAP.
  • Bugs: Portrait and night mode in miui camera not working, Fingerprint, Maybe more
  • Use the latest boot.img from notes.
  • Thanks to all my contributors :)
